scripts.test: npm run build ; npm run run & sleep 2 ; echo trying ; cat ./test/testimg.jpg | curl  -T - -X PUT http://localhost:1031/ -H 'Content-Type: image/jpeg'
scripts.kill: docker kill $(docker ps | grep face-detection-service | awk '{print $1}') || true ; docker rm $(docker ps -a | grep face-detection-service | awk '{print $1}') || true ; docker rmi $(docker images | grep face-detection-service | awk '{print $3}') || true
